fight_environment_skill-20000001: Grant a shield to all SMGs in the echelon. Each shield can absorb up to 40 points of damage.
fight_environment_skill-20000002: Aim for the enemy with the highest HP and deal 2500 damage to it.
fight_environment_skill-20000003: Enhance riot control capabilities of all SGs in the echelon, increasing their armor by 15% for 20 seconds.
fight_environment_skill-20000004: At the start of the battle, deploy a target dummy with 400 HP to attract enemy fire.
fight_environment_skill-20000005: Fire a mortar shell that deals up to 200 damage to enemy units within a 2.5-unit radius.
fight_environment_skill-20000006: Launch an airstrike at the start of the battle, dealing 80 damage to all enemy units.
fight_environment_skill-20000007: Increase the echelon's damage and rate of fire by 5% for 20 seconds (does not stack).
fight_environment_skill-20000008: Increase the echelon's accuracy and crit rate by 10% for 20 seconds (does not stack).
fight_environment_skill-20000701: During night battles, increase allies' crit rate and crit damage by 30%.
fight_environment_skill-20000702: Increase damage dealt to enemy units within a 3-unit distance by 20%.
fight_environment_skill-20000703: Increase allies's damage and evasion by 3% every 4 seconds, stacking up to 10 times.
fight_environment_skill-20000704: The duration of all allies' initial cooldown is reduced by 30%.
fight_environment_skill-20000705: The unit with the highest HP gains a shield that will deflect 9999 points of damage, lasting 8 seconds.
fight_environment_skill-20000706: Allies' armor is reduced by 90% in this battle.
fight_environment_skill-20000707: The ally with the highest damage output is dazed for 5 seconds every 10 seconds.
fight_environment_skill-20000708: At the start of the battle, the echelon's front row will be engulfed in flame, taking 50 points of damage per Dummy-Link every 10 frames, lasting 10 seconds.
fight_environment_skill-20000709: The duration of allies' initial cooldown is increased by 30%.
fight_environment_skill-20000710: The echelon leader's damage, accuracy, evasion, armor, and crit rate are reduced by 90%.
fight_environment_skill-20000711: The echelon's move speed is reduced by 50%.
fight_environment_skill-20000712: The echelon's evasion is reduced by 90% in this battle.
fight_environment_skill-20000714: Deal 999 points of damage to the ally with the lowest damage output every 15 seconds.
fight_environment_skill-20000715: The ally with the highest HP gains an additional 50% reduction in damage intake.
fight_environment_skill-20000716: Weaken a random T-Doll every 15 seconds, reducing her stats (damage, rate of fire, accuracy, evasion, armor) by 50% for 5 seconds.
fight_environment_skill-20000717: Throw an incendiary object at the enemy unit with the highest HP every 6 seconds, dealing 100 points of damage per 0.33 seconds in an area of 3*3, lasting 15 seconds.
fight_environment_skill-20000718: Increase the evasion and armor of allies on the front row by 10%, stacking up to 10 times.
fight_environment_skill-20000719: Generate a shield with a value that equals 10% of the enemy's lost HP every 15 seconds. The shield lasts for 6 seconds.
fight_environment_skill-20000720: Summon a fully Dummy-Linked target every 10 seconds. Each Dummy of the target has 1000HP.
fight_environment_skill-20000721: Generate a group of enemies in front of the echelon every 6 seconds.
fight_environment_skill-20000722: Reduce the duration of all allies' skill cooldown by 20% every time a skill is activated.
fight_environment_skill-20000723: The echelon's rate of fire is increased by 100%.
fight_environment_skill-20000724: Generate a shield with a value that equals 30% of allies' lost HP every 10 seconds. The shield lasts for 6 seconds.
fight_environment_skill-20000725: Weaken a random enemy unit every 10 seconds, reducing their stats (damage, rate of fire, accuracy, evasion, armor) by 50%.
fight_environment_skill-20000726: The echelon's rate of fire is reduced by 50%.
fight_environment_skill-20000727: The echelon leader's damage, accuracy, evasion, armor, and crit rate are increased by 50%.
fight_environment_skill-20000728: Reduce allies' rate of fire by 20% while increasing their damage and accuracy by 20%.
fight_environment_skill-20000729: Generate a shield with a value that equals 30% of the echelon's lost HP every 10 seconds. The shield lasts for 6 seconds.
fight_environment_skill-20000730: Reduce the duration of friendly HG T-Dolls' skill cooldown by 20%.
fight_environment_skill-20000731: Increase friendly SMG T-Dolls' accuracy and evasion by 100%.
fight_environment_skill-20000732: Increase friendly RF T-Dolls' rate of fire and crit rate by 20%.
fight_environment_skill-20000733: Increase friendly AR T-Dolls' damage and accuracy by 20% and 100% respectively.
fight_environment_skill-20000734: Increase friendly SG T-Dolls' armor by 20% and reduce their damage intake by 20%.
fight_environment_skill-20000735: Increase friendly MG T-Dolls' ammo box capacity by 15.
fight_environment_skill-20000736: At the start of the battle, each ally gains a shield with a value that equals 20% of their maximum HP, lasting 10 seconds.
fight_environment_skill-20000737: The echelon's rate of fire is increased by 50%.
fight_environment_skill-20000738: The duration of all allies' initial cooldown is reduced by 50%.
fight_environment_skill-20000740: The echelon's damage, rate of fire, accuracy, and evasion are increased by 30% with each different gun type.
fight_environment_skill-20000741: Erase all buffs on the echelon every 8 seconds.
fight_environment_skill-20000743: Increase the duration of a skill cooldown by 100% every time a skill is used.
